XIV.4.D.3.b
.
Earned Income Recipient Letters
Letters to recipients of earned income are bulk mailed to PMCs for screening and release.  Recipient letters list payers and amounts reported and ask recipients for certification.
Important
:  PMCs should not release recipient letters if the income has already been reported or if it will not affect entitlement to VA benefits.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section D - Federal Tax Information (FTI): Income Verification Match (IVM)
